account.function: Issuer of RLUSD stablecoin (pegged to USD)
account.how_to_get_info: Use account_info API for account details; account_lines for trustlines/holders; account_tx for transactions. Domain: ripple.com
account.additional_info: Flags include depositAuth, disableMasterKey, disallowIncomingXRP, requireDestinationTag, allowTrustLineClawback. Total supply can be estimated from account_lines balances.

account.function: Oracle publishing XRP/USD prices via TrustSet transactions
account.how_to_get_info: Use account_tx API with ledger ranges for historical prices; parse LimitAmount.value for aggregated price, memos for exchange data (hex-encoded CSV). Domain: xrpl-labs.com
account.additional_info: Prices updated ~every 60 seconds. Memos include rates from Bitstamp, Kraken, Bitfinex, HitBTC, Binance. Historical prices: ~0.62 (2y ago), ~1.89 (1y ago), ~2.41 (1w ago), ~2.22 (current).
Has balance, sequence, etc. Used in examples.

account.function: EverNorth company account, holds large XRP balance and sends payments
account.how_to_get_info: Use account_info API for account details; account_tx for transactions. Created by rD4G6gtD2KwHqsRf7pcyA8r1neUzXT61ix
account.additional_info: Flags include disableMasterKey, requireDestinationTag. Uses multi-sign with signers rGJUhrGoqk2bxJoWYYxWpQtkMY6TRYj83A and rJYTKHEVhHKhaXF5GnRPd6zUaBSVDqTjRH. Recent tx: large XRP payments to other accounts.

account.function: Account creator/funder, sends XRP to activate new accounts
account.ownership: Unknown (likely related to EverNorth or service provider)
account.how_to_get_info: Use account_info API for account details; account_tx for transactions
account.additional_info: Normal account with large balance. Recent tx: payments of ~1.22 XRP to create new accounts. Sequence: 125655.
